frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-keyman
frozen.shortDescription: Access passwords from the gnome keyring in a convenient way:
frozen.longDescription:
Access passwords from the gnome keyring in a convenient way:
Simply search for your password and copy it to clipboad by clicking it. After a certain amount of time it will be removed automatically (default is 5 seconds). As this only works if the keyrings are unlocked, this extension also provides easy access to lock/unlock keyrings.
